rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable OI.NHOID

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined identifier for a non-host organism. NHOID should be populated with an intuitive name based on the identity of the organism as reported by the lab. It must be unique for each unique organism as defined by the specific values of the organism's entire known taxonomy described by pairs of OIPARMCD and OIVAL .
datasetVariables.label: Non-host Organism Identifier
datasetVariables.name: NHOID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)
